review: I have been able to get it to connect 1 time to the internet since I bought it 2 months ago. I thought it may be my internet so I borrowed it to my mom and nothing. Could not connect. Also you need to plug in into the TV which I knew but that if had to be plugged in to a outlet also was a bummer. If you want any help with it GOOD LUCK!!!!!! I thought maybe there was a setting that I could change to get better luck but the manual that come with it basically tells you plug it into you TV and the wall. If you aren't getting a good signal add the extender to it. I had my router sitting behind my TV and that was still not strong enough signal. I have very fast internet for everything else. (use the XBOX and a BluRay player and they are perfect) Bought this to have something easy to move from TV to TV.SAVE YOUR MONEY!
